Step.Name: create stored procedures
Step.Script: CREATE PROCEDURE "${DbName}"."${Company}_SP_TRANSACTION_NOTIFICATION" ( IN _object_type nvarchar(30), --对象类型（BOCode） IN _transaction_type nvarchar(1), --业务类型（Add:A-添加, Update:U-更新, Delete:D-删除） IN _num_of_cols_in_key integer, --主键个数 IN _list_of_key_cols_tab_del nvarchar(255), --主键名称 IN _list_of_cols_val_tab_del nvarchar(255) --主键值 ) LANGUAGE SQLSCRIPT AS BEGIN --返回值 DECLARE _error integer; --返回值(0 无错误) DECLARE _error_message nvarchar(200); --返回的消息 SELECT 0 INTO _error FROM dummy; SELECT 'OK' INTO _error_message FROM dummy; -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --ADD YOUR CODE HERE -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --返回结果 SELECT TO_INTEGER(_error) "code", _error_message "message" FROM dummy; END
